function RYU_EP04_23()
    -- .エピローグ
    SaveData.Title = "エピローグ"

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-500,200)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

    -- //BU：ネメシア・嘲笑
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[While the audience roared at the dramatic turnaround――Nemesia Himegami, who was watching the scene, sneered.
劇的な逆転劇で客席が湧く一方――その様子を眺めていた姫神ネメシアは嘲笑っていた。]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0177.wav")
    MSG([[
【Nemesia】
 "It's like watching Marika Ikusa from a year ago. No matter how much they struggle, there's no way they can win against us."
「まるで一年前の伊草マリカを見ているようだわねえ。どう足掻いたところで、私たちに勝ち目などあるワケがないのに」]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0178.wav")
    MSG([[
【Nemesia】
 "You think so too, don't you? Hey, Artemelia."
「アナタもそう思うでしょう？　ねえ、アルメリア」]])

    -- //BU：ネメシア・嘲笑、アルメリア・邪悪笑み
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_ARU01na")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0046.wav")
    MSG([[
【Artemelia】
 "Exactly right. That figure thinking there's hope ahead is utterly ridiculous."
「まったくもってその通りですね。この先に希望があると思っているあの姿、とっても滑稽ですわ」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0179.wav")
    MSG([[
【Nemesia】
 "You've no lingering feelings for that girl? It's completely fine to erase them, right?"
「あの子への未練はなくなった？　完全に、消しちゃってもいいのよね？」]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0047.wav")
    MSG([[
【Artemelia】
 "Yes, I'm ready. Please erase everything—even the memories inside me—completely and cleanly."
「ええ、覚悟はできています。私の中の思い出ごと、全部キレイに消してください」]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0048.wav")
    MSG([[
【Artemelia】
 "...This is goodbye, Mina-chan. If you're going to hold a grudge, hold it against the you who forgot about me."
「……これでお別れだよ、ミナちゃん。恨むなら、私のことを忘れたキミを恨んでね」]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0049.wav")
    MSG([[
【Artemelia】
 "Hehe... heh, hehehehe..."
「でへへ……でへ、でへへへへ……」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 2000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_01")
end
